evidence: From the experimental results for combining our OOV term translation model with English-Chinese CrossLanguage Information Retrieval ( CLIR ) on the data sets of Text Retrieval Evaluation Conference ( TREC it can be found that the obvious performance improvement for both query translation and retrieval can also be obtained .
